snippet: The Philadelphia rookie Nick Foles, who replaced Michael Vick during a 38-23 loss to Dallas, will make his first N.F.L. start on Sunday against Washington.
abstract: NFL Roundup; Philadelphia Eagles quarterback Michael Vick will miss upcoming game against Washington Redskins due to effects of a concussion, allowing rookie Nick Foles his first NFL start; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: The Philadelphia rookie Nick Foles, who replaced Michael Vick during a 38-23 loss to Dallas, will make his first N.F.L. start on Sunday against Washington.

headline.seo: Eagles, With Michael Vick Out, Turn to Rookie Quarterback Nick Foles
headline.main: With Vick Out, Eagles Look to Rookie for a Lift
headline.print_headline: With Vick Out, Eagles Look to Rookie for a Lift
